DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , prospective observational study evaluate correlation liver biopsy transient elastography liver fibrosis assessment patient chronic hepatitis C. Data collect 96 week .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study To Assess Liver Fibrosis Stages Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C Infection
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /= 18 year age Chronic Hepatitis C infection ( monoinfection coinfection human immunodeficiency virus [ HIV ] ) Detectable level hepatitis C RNA Initiating treatment pegylated interferon plus ribavirin , pegylated interferon plus ribavirin , boceprevir telaprevir accord local guideline Last liver biopsy perform later 3 month prior enrolment study Coinfection hepatitis B virus Previous treatment pegylated interferon ribavirin Participation another clinical study last 12 month prior study start
